  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterCard

      public CharacterCard(int id, int cost, int noEntryTiles, Bag bag)
      This constructor creates the card and places students on it if necessary.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the card.
      cost - the cost of the card.
      noEntryTiles - the number of NoEntryTiles on the card.
      bag - the bag useful to drawStudents and place them on the card.

  • Method Details

    • setupCharacterCard

      private void setupCharacterCard(int id)
      This method sets the card up: places students or noEntryTiles on it.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the card.

    • increaseCost

      public void increaseCost()
      This method increases the cost of the card each time a player chooses it.

    • executeEffect

      public void executeEffect(CardEffect cardEffect) throws EndGameException, IllegalClientInputException, EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException
      Parameters:
      cardEffect - is the effect that will be executed when the method is called.
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when the game ends.
      IllegalClientInputException - when user inserts a wrong input
      EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException - when general coin supply is empty

    • drawStudent

      public Color drawStudent(Color student) throws IllegalClientInputException
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student to draw from the CharacterCard.
      Returns:
      the color of the drawn student.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException

      public boolean hasParameters()
